name: Dangerous Field
description:
In this bullet hell farming sim you must subdue your plants and make as much money as possible in 12 days! Good luck!

Controls:
                               [W]
Movement [A][S][D] 
Interact: [F]
Fire: Left Mouse Button

What I used:
-Unity3D
-Bfxr
-Alex Ocias's Pixel Camera
-FMod Studio
-Aseprite
-Visual Studio 2015

Change Log: 

4/23/18

-Added Mac + Linux Builds

-Fixed Coins going outside of fences

-Fixed Doors acting weird
